biocontainers.name: bioconductor-zinbwave
biocontainers.summary: Implements a general and flexible zero-inflated negative binomial model that can be used to provide a low-dimensional representations of single-cell rna-seq data. the model accounts for zero inflation (dropouts), over-dispersion, and the count nature of the data. the model also accounts for the difference in library sizes and optionally for batch effects and/or other covariates, avoiding the need for pre-normalize the data.
